item.title: trigger
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy::trigger Manually trigger the actions on this policy. Returns members if the trigger has an effect, or an empty set of members if there is no effect. Sometimes this may not have an effect if the group is not active, in cooldown, or the result would violate the group range. If this call fails, the group is suspended, the failure logged, and a ticket is created. Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Scale_PolicyInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Scale_PolicyObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Scale_Member[]
